title: South Island Chalet-Style Cottage Stay with Outdoor Hot Tub
description: Experience complete tranquillity at Goldfield Suites in the heart of New Zealand's untamed West Coast. This secluded chalet-style cottage stay is nestled on two hectares of pristine bushland, yet is only a few minutes' drive from Greymouth. Centrally located to some of the region's best attractions - from wilderness walks to historic gold mining towns. Wake to the sound of native birds before taking a stroll through local bush walks, enjoy a soak in the wood-fired hot tub and later indulge in a communal slow-smoked bbq meal.
offer_address: 376a Rutherglen Rd, Marsden, Greymouth 7805, New Zealand
